lead_paragraph: The Interior Ministry imposed the measure after protests over unemployment across the country turned violent in some cities.

byline.original: By CARLOTTA GALL and FARAH SAMTI

headline.print_headline: Tunisian Government Sets Nationwide Curfew Amid Growing Unrest
headline.main: Tunisia Sets Nationwide Curfew Amid Growing Unrest

snippet: The Interior Ministry imposed the measure after protests over unemployment across the country turned violent in some cities.
abstract: Tunisian government imposes nationwide curfew in response to protests against unemployment, which have grown violent even as they have spread across country.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
